titles.title: "Negi-sensei, Douyara Climax Desu" by Akira "Minna de Issho ni Kaerou ne, Negi-kun!" by Misora
M. Negi, on a atteint le climax. Rentrons tous ensemble, Negi.
Professor Negi, It Appears This Is the Climax. Let`s All Go Home Together, Negi!
「ネギ先生, どうやらクライマックスです」byアキラ 「みんなで一緒に帰ろうね, ネギくん!」by美空
